descriptionNullable:
The Sogou news corpus is a corpus used by Sogou Labs for text classification. It contains 10 categories of text data, including automobile, finance, internet technology, health, education, military, tourism, sports, culture, and recruitment. Each category contains 1990 texts.
C000007 Automobile
C000008 Finance
C000010 Internet Technology
C000013 Health
C000014 Sports
C000016 Travel
C000020 Education
C000022 Recruitment
C000023 Culture
C000024 Military
